statements: SELECT * FROM feedback_ratings;
SELECT user_id, rating, comment FROM feedback_ratings ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT product_id, user_id, rating FROM feedback_ratings WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT user_id, rating, comment FROM feedback_ratings WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_id, user_id, rating, comment FROM feedback_ratings WHERE product_id = '9a43098f-6f95-4e6d-bb09-90e7b4f37c59' ORDER BY rating ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_ratings WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT product_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM feedback_ratings GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(id) AS total_ratings FROM feedback_ratings GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(id) > 5;
SELECT user_id, MAX(rating) AS highest_rating FROM feedback_ratings WHERE product_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(DISTINCT product_id) AS total_products_rated FROM feedback_ratings GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT product_id) > 3;
SELECT * FROM product_ratings;
SELECT product_id, rating FROM product_ratings WHERE rating > 3.5;
SELECT product_id, rating, comment FROM product_ratings ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT comment_id, product_id, user_id, comment_text FROM product_comments ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, product_id, comment_text FROM product_comments WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM product_ratings WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, rating FROM product_ratings WHERE comment IS NULL;
SELECT product_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM product_ratings GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM product_comments WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, count(comment_id) AS total_comments FROM product_comments GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_comments > 5;
SELECT * FROM product_feedback;
SELECT product_id, rating FROM product_feedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM product_info ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, feedback_date FROM user_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_category FROM product_info WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM product_feedback WHERE rating > 4.5 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM product_info WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, product_id, rating FROM user_feedback WHERE rating < 3.0 AND feedback_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT product_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM user_feedback GROUP BY product_id HAVING avg_rating > 4.0 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_feedback WHERE comment LIKE '%great%' OR comment LIKE '%excellent%' ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM product_ratings WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT product_id, rating FROM product_ratings ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT user_id, comment FROM user_comments WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, user_id, comment FROM product_comments WHERE product_id = 5 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(rating) as average_rating FROM user_ratings GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM product_ratings WHERE rating > 4
SELECT product_id, rating, comment FROM product_comments WHERE product_id = 1 ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT user_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM user_ratings GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 3
SELECT product_id, user_id, comment FROM user_comments WHERE user_id = 5 AND product_id = 2
SELECT user_id, rating, comment FROM user_ratings JOIN user_comments ON user_ratings.user_id = user_comments.user_id AND user_ratings.product_id = user_comments.product_id
SELECT * FROM product_ratings WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM product_details WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT user_id, total_ratings FROM user_ratings_summary ORDER BY total_ratings DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_comments WHERE comment_text LIKE '%great%';
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM user_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM product_ratings WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM product_details WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM product_ratings GROUP BY user_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 4;
SELECT user_id, feedback_date, feedback_text FROM user_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01' AND feedback_date < '2022-02-01';
SELECT p.product_name, pr.user_id, pr.rating, pr.comments FROM product_details p JOIN product_ratings pr ON p.product_id = pr.product_id ORDER BY pr.rating DESC, p.product_name ASC;
